author: Isabel Brown
description: Words will never be able to convey how devastated we are that Charlie Kirk was taken from us far too soon. I had the honor and privilege of not just knowing Charlie professionally as a fellow warrior in the conservative movement, but as a close friend and my most influential mentor for the past eight ...
title: Charlie Kirk, The Perfect Embodiment Of Salt And Light

author: Zach Jewell
description: Daily Wire hosts Ben Shapiro and Matt Walsh stood firm in their defense of free speech and conservative values after the assassination of Charlie Kirk, even as some unhinged leftists called for more political commentators to be targeted. Shapiro and Walsh dedicated their shows on Thursday to honoring the legacy of Kirk, who was killed ...
title: Ben Shapiro Vows To ‘Pick up That Blood-Stained Microphone Where Charlie Left It’

author: Leif Le Mahieu
description: Florida officials promised Thursday to discipline teachers who celebrate the assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk. Florida Commissioner of Education Anastasios Kamoutsas sent a memo to school superintendents saying that there would be consequences for employees who celebrate or mock the killing of Kirk, who was gunned down on Wednesday while holding an event at ...
title: Florida Pledges To Hold Teachers ‘Accountable’ Who Celebrate Charlie Kirk’s Death

author: Amanda Harding
description: The women of “The View” are known for delusional takes, but when it came to discussing the assassination of Charlie Kirk, they displayed a remarkable amount of restraint and introspection, for once. Panelist Whoopi Goldberg began by calling the shooting “beyond devastating.” “Our hearts, of course, go out to the family of Charlie Kirk,” she ...
title: ‘The View’ Reacts To Charlie Kirk Assassination: ‘Antithetical To Who We Are As Americans’

author: Hank Berrien
description: In a display of grotesque moral bankruptcy, Oxford Union’s incoming president George Abaraonye appeared to celebrate the murder of Charlie Kirk — just months after debating him on stage. Following Kirk’s assassination at Utah Valley University — where he was shot in the neck while calmly fielding questions — Abaraonye allegedly posted in a student ...
title: Oxford Union Prez-Elect Cheers Charlie Kirk’s Murder: ‘Let’s F***ing Go’

author: Ben Shapiro
description: It is easier to be a great man than to be a good man. To be a great man very often just means you have an impact on the world, that you change people’s lives, that you create structures that make the world a better place. But to be a good man requires you to ...
title: Unthinkable: Charlie Kirk, 31, Assassinated

author: Leif Le Mahieu
description: While urging Americans to remember the victims of the 9/11 terrorist attacks, top Republicans on the House Homeland Security Committee are urging vigilance over threats facing the country due to “open-border policies” pushed during the Biden administration.  The lawmakers are calling for a resolute commitment to border security after a massive surge in individuals on ...
title: On 9/11, Republicans Warn About Lingering Danger From Biden’s ‘Open-Border Policies’

author: Leif Le Mahieu
description: A dean at a university in Tennessee was fired on Wednesday after she said she had “zero sympathy” following the assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk.  Middle Tennessee State University Associate Dean of Students Laura Sosh-Lightsy was fired for “inappropriate and callous” social media posts about the killing of Kirk, the university confirmed to The ...
title: Tennessee University Dean Fired After Saying She Had No Sympathy For Charlie Kirk

author: Tim Rice
description: In the moments after an assassin’s bullet claimed Charlie Kirk’s life, the unspeakable, up-close video of his final moments was likely the most-viewed clip in the world. But in the hours that followed, another video emerged, and it’s likely the video that will persist as Kirk’s memory crystalizes into legacy. He shared it himself, just ...
title: Charlie Kirk’s Real Mission Was Only Just Beginning

author: Virginia Kruta
description: Rep. Seth Moulton (D-MA) used the assassination of conservative commentator and Turning Point USA founder Charlie Kirk as an opportunity to complain about “right-wing extremists” and blame them for political violence in the United States. Moulton made an appearance on CNN to discuss Kirk’s assassination — which had occurred not even 24 hours earlier at ...
title: Democrat Blasts ‘Right-Wing Extremists’ Less Than 24 Hours After Charlie Kirk Assassination

author: Amanda Harding
description: The transgender-identifying comic book creator who celebrated Charlie Kirk’s death on social media will no longer be producing work for DC Comics, the entertainment company has announced. The mature readers comic series “Red Hood,” a Batman spinoff project, was written by Gretchen Felker-Martin and had artwork by Jeff Spokes. The first book launched on the ...
title: DC Comics Cancels Batman Spinoff Series After Creator Celebrates Charlie Kirk’s Murder

author: Matt Walsh
description: The last time I saw my friend Charlie Kirk in person was when I appeared with him on stage at the TPUSA pastor’s summit back in the spring. I spoke with him backstage beforehand and told him, as I had several times before, that I was incredibly impressed by this institution and movement that he ...
title: America Will Never Be The Same After Charlie Kirk’s Assassination

author: Amanda Harding
description: Leftists are losing their minds over social media influencer Jeffree Star having a compassionate, human response to the assassination of Charlie Kirk.  The makeup brand founder, who has more than 13 million followers on Instagram and close to 8 million on TikTok, clapped back at those who accused him of being a Republican because of ...
title: Pink-Haired Makeup Artist Jeffree Star Has Unlikely Reaction To Charlie Kirk’s Murder

author: Virginia Kruta
description: CNN left one key aspect out of its own coverage even after a number of reports stated that ammunition — recovered from the scene of Turning Point USA founder Charlie Kirk’s assassination in Utah on Wednesday — had been engraved with phrases reflecting “transgender, antifascist ideology.” The ammunition was found with an older model .30-caliber ...
title: CNN Scrubs Potential Trans Angle From Coverage Of Hunt For Charlie Kirk’s Assassin

author: Virginia Kruta
description: “CBS Mornings” host Nate Burleson asked former House Speaker Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) on Thursday whether the horrific assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk would be a good opportunity for Republicans to consider how they might be contributing to a culture of political violence. Steve Guest shared video, along with the comment, “In the wake of ...
title: CBS Host Wonders When Republicans Will Accept ‘Responsibility’ For People Shooting At Them

author: Eric Arellano
description: In 2001, I was a young, brand-new private who had joined the Army to provide a better life for his family. I also had hopes of using the military to pay for my education. But when I woke up on the morning of September 11 at Fort Benning, Georgia, I did not immediately realize how ...
title: The Morning America Was Attacked, I Became A Soldier

author: Gates Garcia
description: Today is September 11. And in our house, we’re going to talk about it. Not because it’s easy. Not because I like reliving it. But because I don’t want my kids to grow up as part of a generation that doesn’t know what 9/11 was, how it changed America, and what Americans did the very ...
title: Why I’m Teaching My Kids About The Spirit Of 9/12

author: Zach Jewell
description: Investigators found ammunition inside the .30 caliber bolt action rifle believed to have been used in the Charlie Kirk assassination, with government documents reported on by both The Wall Street Journal and conservative commentator Steven Crowder saying that unused ammunition was engraved with “transgender and anti-fascist ideology.” The Department of Justice did not confirm the ...
title: Ammunition From Charlie Kirk Assassination Was Engraved With ‘Transgender And Anti-Fascist Ideology’

author: Amanda Prestigiacomo
description: Conservative icon Charlie Kirk, who was assassinated on Wednesday at the age of 31, was asked before he died how he wanted to be remembered. Kirk, unsurprisingly, pointed to his faith in Jesus Christ. “How do you wanna be remembered? … [If] everything just goes away [and] you could be associated with one thing, how ...
title: Charlie Kirk Was Asked How He Wanted To Be Remembered. He Pointed To His Faith.

author: Zach Jewell
description: President Donald Trump announced Thursday that he will hold a ceremony honoring conservative commentator Charlie Kirk and will posthumously award him the Presidential Medal of Freedom following Kirk’s assassination at an event in Utah. The Presidential Medal of Freedom is the highest civilian honor in the United States. Trump made the announcement after paying tribute ...
title: ‘A Giant Of His Generation’: Trump To Award Charlie Kirk The Presidential Medal Of Freedom

author: Amanda Harding
description: The world is mourning the tragic loss of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, who was assassinated during a speaking event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday. Since the Turning Point USA founder was fatally shot, tributes have been pouring in, including people at the highest levels of government, down to students who were inspired by Kirk’s ...
title: ‘God Help Us’: Celebrities React In Shock To Charlie Kirk Assassination

author: Morning Wire
description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was assassinated on Wednesday at a speaking event in Utah. As the nation mourns, we look back at the remarkable legacy of a man who helped reshape American politics. It’s Thursday, September 11, 2025, and this is the news you need to know to start your day. Morning Wire is available ...
title: Morning Brief: Charlie Kirk Assassinated, Authorities Have ‘Good Video Footage’ Of Suspected Killer

author: Zach Jewell
description: State and federal authorities released a joint update on Wednesday night on the assassination of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University, saying that two people had been detained for questioning and later released. In a press release issued by the Utah Department of Public Safety and the FBI, authorities said that George Zinn ...
title: Charlie Kirk Assassination: Authorities Release Update On Questioned ‘Suspects’ As Manhunt Continues

author: Rick Lynch
description: The terrorist attacks on 11 September 2001, were a wake-up call for America, and I sincerely hope it is not one we as a nation have forgotten. There are still folks out there who hate our freedoms and our way of life. We are no longer protected by oceans and geographical distance from potential enemies. ...
title: I Was An Army Commander On 9/11. I’m Still Concerned About America’s Readiness.

author: John Dove
description: It’s difficult to believe that 24 years have passed since that fateful September morning in 2001 when a group of radical Islamic terrorists slammed planes into the World Trade Center, the Pentagon and a rural field in Pennsylvania, murdering 2,977 innocent people. So much had changed in New York City in the years leading up ...
title: I Was An NYPD Detective On 9/11. This Is What I Saw.
